name: rocketpool-docs
description: Rocket Pool Documentation - Decentralised ETH2 Proof of Stake Protocol

scripts.nvm:
nodever=$(<.nvmrc) && node -v | grep -q "v$nodever" && echo "Correct node version" || echo '[31mWARNING: UNSUPPORTED NODE VERSION[0m
'
scripts.dev: npm run nvm && vuepress dev src
